snippet: Besides Macklemore & Ryan Lewis, who are up for seven prizes, other big nominees included the rappers Jay Z and Kendrick Lamar, and Justin Timberlake.
abstract: Macklemore & Ryan Lewis, independent rap duo from Seattle, are up for seven Grammy Awards; other nominees are listed.
lead_paragraph: Besides Macklemore & Ryan Lewis, who are up for seven prizes, other big nominees included the rappers Jay Z and Kendrick Lamar, and Justin Timberlake.

headline.main: Macklemore & Ryan Lewis Dominate Grammy Nominations
headline.print_headline: Seattle Rap Duo Dominates Grammy Choices
